column5: Anyone know where i can get a feed of smelts other than lake O or Erie? If you know where I can get a 1/2 bucket of smelts, send me an email and let me know! Thanks in advance.
Yer gonna starve ta death waitin' fer an answer thar Johnnie. Bes' ya venture out onna yer own, go fer a drive ta Britt, an go prepared!
lol. Thought it was worth a shot!! I will wait for rain and go check it out.
